description: After watching his crush have at it with another beau, Zion Nicholas decides that 2 can play at that game, and hops on the app to find a rebound. Once it's nice and ready, Zion slides his cock deep into Elye, then proceeds to pound him all over his living room. He fucks the cum out of Elye before drowning him with his load, but he learns that you can't always fuck the pain away, no matter how hard you might try. Enjoy!
title: The Art Of Love - Part 2
